H3.text: who is the longest railway station in india. Gorakhpur Junction

A4.text: It is the second largest and second busiest railway station in India and West Bengal in terms of platforms, tracks and overall daily passenger holding capacity, making it one of the world also.

A5.text: Over 1.5 million passengers use the station on a daily basis.
